name: The King's New Castle
description: Play a king who has discovered beautiful land on which he now wants to build a magnificent castle. If only these annoying fiends were not there!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2105/ AMD a10-5800k Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia Geforce gtx 750Ti/ AMD Radeon RX 470 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 720p
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/ AMD Ryzen 7 1800x Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1080p
